We are Hiring

Join Us
  • Technical Lead
  • Software Engineer - JavaScript Developer
  • Data Research Associate
  • Telesales Associate - Evening Shift
  • Sr. Operations Officer

Applicants will be shortlisted on the basis of their skills and their qualification. Shortlisted candidates will be called for a personal interview and the best candidates will be selected among them.

×

Technical Lead

  • Responsibilites
  • - Deliver major capability improvements to end user applications in a technical leadership role.
  • - Serve as the project lead by taking full ownership of technical deliverables for multiple projects.
  • - Understand the big picture and make design decisions to align with it.
  • - Responsible for the overall technical deliverables in a sprint.
  • - Accurately report the status with alarms, explanations and solutions.
  • - Business facing.
  • - Ability to partner with business leaders to deliver business driven projects and successfully influence the business, IT domain teams with requirements, technology use and design decisions.
  • - Act as a communication proxy for team and frequently explain technical decisions in business terms.
  • - Raise the talent level within the team - through mentoring developers in Java, JEE, Spring, Javascript, HTML, TDD and drive the team towards on target high-quality deliverables.
  • - Establish credibility through the quality of your work and through strong hand on coding expertise, remove the technical impediments for the team.
  • - Work closely with the Project manager and Product Manager to validate requirements and provide technical guidance to the development team.
  • - Provide technical consultations for the on-going development work.
  • - Implement reusable unit tests to ensure the integrity of on-going product quality.
  • - Responsible for validating that the system meets requirements through participation in reviews – design and test plans as well as test results.
  • - Provide technical input on unit and integration tests for server- and client-side applications, build and deployment procedures and standards.
  • - Lead technical discussion to provide technical guidance and create coding standards.
  • Education Background
  • - Bachelor's Degree in IT ( BIM/BIT/BSC IT/BE in Computer Science and Engineering)
  • Requirement
  • - Minimum 5 years experience in designing and implementing end-to-end enterprise grade software.
  • - Solid knowledge of the Java programming language.
  • - Excellent understanding of distributed multi-tier infrastructure.
  • - Experience with Big Data and Cloud Platform, fa-leaf
  • - Knowledge of design patterns (MVC, Strategy, Factory, Singleton) and general design considerations.
  • - Extensive experience using XML, JSON and REST Web Services.
  • - Experience with application servers (WebLogic, WebSphere, Jboss), web servers (Apache) and servlet containers such as Tomcat or Jetty.
  • - Exposure to caching technologies such as Memcached or Redis.
  • - Experience using open source libraries and technologies such as Apache Solr, Zookeeper, etc
  • - Experience using NoSQL Databases such as MongoDB, ElasticSearch and Cassandra.
  • - Proficient in SCM tools and best practices (GIT, Maven, Gradle, Jenkins, Travis).
  • - Exposure to Node.js, Ember.js to build rich UI components would be a plus.
  • - Excellent oral and written communication skills.
  • - A creative thinker and experienced problem solver.
  • - Advanced knowledge of JavaScript, Ajax, JSON, HTML, and CSS.
  • - Proficient with the use of RESTful services.
  • - Advanced understanding of algorithms, data structures, performance optimization strategies and best practices.
  • - Proficient in object oriented design principles and automated testing strategies for web applications.
  • - Knowledge of agile software development process.
  • - Experiences of code refactoring, design patterns, design driven development, continuous integration, building highly scalable applications, application security.
  • To Apply,
  • Please send your applications with a detailed resume at nepal@fusemachines.com
  • Or,

Software Engineer - JavaScript Developer

  • Responsibilites
  • - Analysing user requirements, designing, coding, debugging, supporting and documenting applications.
  • - Responsible for development and improvement of technical framework.
  • - Expertise with Object Oriented Design,design pattern and data structures.
  • - Responsible for meeting expectations and deliverable on time and in high quality.
  • - Communicate and provide support to project team.
  • - Adhere to and help develop best practices.
  • - Deadline-oriented with the ability to prioritize multiple projects.
  • - Demonstrate creative, technical and analytical skills.
  • - Taking part in the preliminary planning of the applications.
  • - Advising the executive as required to construct the application.
  • Education Background
  • - Bachelor's Degree in IT ( BIM/BIT/BSCIT/BE)
  • Requirement
  • - 2+ years’ experience working on enterprise or consumer web apps.
  • - Experience with HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript.
  • - Experience with web frameworks like React, Ember, Angular, etc.
  • - Experience building data visualizations in HTML/JS.
  • - Web standards and best practices for load time reduction.
  • - Ability to work creatively and constructively in a team.
  • - Good level of written and spoken english.
  • - BONUS: Experience with Ember.js and Node.js.
  • - Experience with HTML5 and CSS3 application development will be added advantage.
  • At Fusemachines (Nepal), you will
  • - Become part of a revolution in how insights for strategic decisions at a global level are generated.
  • - Learn and grow professionally with a highly motivated team that pushes boundaries.
  • - Receive a competitive remuneration package with attractive career prospects.
  • - Work in a disruptive startup with an AI platforms.
  • - Join a friendly, culturally diverse team that values excellence, team spirit, passion and courage.
  • - Enjoy the perks of a cool start-up, laid back culture and great office space.
  • To Apply,
  • Please send your applications with a detailed resume at nepal@fusemachines.com
  • Or,
  • Note: Freshers are also encouraged to apply for the post.

Data Research Associate

  • Responsibilites
  • - Conducting research work online by utilizing available resources to generate leads on the basis of criteria given by clients.
  • - Email validation and Quality Assurance of generated leads.
  • - Mail Merges & proper management of Inbox.
  • - Complete email logs & produce reports.
  • - Document work progress according to standard operating procedures.
  • Qualification & Experience
  • - Bachelor’s degree completed is preferable
  • - Prior relevant work experience of 2 to 6 months is preferable.
  • Competencies Required
  • - Excellent communication skills – written and verbal in English.
  • - Good research skills and attention to detail.
  • - Good problem solving skill.
  • - Ability to read, write and edit content.
  • - Capable of working effectively within a team as well as independently.
  • - Advanced computer skills required (Word, Excel and PowerPoint).
  • To Apply,
  • Please send your applications with a detailed resume at nepal@fusemachines.com
  • Or,

Telesales Associate (Evening Shift)

  • Responsibilites
  • - Manage large amounts of inbound and outbound calls in a timely manner.
  • - Identify customers’ needs, clarify information, research every issue and provide solutions and/or alternatives.
  • - Seize opportunities to upsell products when they arise.
  • - Build sustainable relationships and engage customers by taking the extra mile.
  • - Recognize, document, and alert the management team of trends in customer calls.
  • - Complete call logs and produce reports.
  • - Answer calls and respond to emails.
  • - Handle customer inquiries both telephonically and by email.
  • - Meet personal/team qualitative and quantitative targets.
  • - Provide customers with product and service information and do follow ups.
  • - Other duties as assigned.
  • Qualification and Experience
  • - Bachelor’s degree ongoing or completed.
  • - Work experience in call centre and customer service staffing is preferable.
  • Competencies Required
  • - Excellent English Proficiency on written and verbal.
  • - Excellent ability to read, write, listen and edit content.
  • - Excellent in Business Communication.
  • - Knowledge of customer service principles and practices.
  • - Knowledge of call center telephony and technology.
  • - Self disciplined and customer focused
  • - Good research skills and attention to detail.
  • - Good problem-solving skill.
  • - Good data entry skill and multi tasking.
  • - Capable of working effectively within a team as well as independently.
  • - Advanced computer skills required (Word, Excel and PowerPoint).
  • Note:
  • - Able to work in shift wise basis.
  • - Evening Shift: 1PM to 10 PM (Drop off and one time meal facility).
  • - Female candidates are encouraged to apply.
  • To Apply,
  • Please send your applications with a detailed resume at nepal@fusemachines.com
  • Or,

Sr. Operations Officer

  • Responsibilites
  • Procurement
  • - Under Procurement, he/she is responsible for the process of selecting vendors, establishing payment terms, strategic prior formal and thorough examination, and selection, the negotiation of contracts/agreements and actual purchasing of the goods under the procurement procedures.
  • Logistics
  • - Transportation management.
  • - Inventory management by maintaining and monitoring all the office inventory and equipments.
  • - Store Management.
  • - Logistic Information Management.
  • Repair and Maintenance
  • - Conduct regular operational reviews for preventive maintenance.
  • - Manage in repairing / maintaining the equipment, tools, etc as and when required.
  • - Prepare program budgets and facilitate programs around the company.
  • Others:
  • - Assist in performing day to day office functions.
  • - Support in managing and resolving operational issues.
  • - Update internal operating procedures document as needed.
  • - Provide guidance to staff in resolving operational problems as and when required.
  • - Conduct regular meetings to discuss about the operational updates, ideas and issues.
  • - Ensure that operational activities are executed within allocated budget and timelines.
  • - Perform budget allocation and expense management for all business operational activities.
  • - Develop and implement plans to improve operational effectiveness and quickly.
  • - Provide follow-ups as well as update internal operating procedures document.
  • - Accomplish any other job as assigned by the managing director as and when required.
  • Competencies Required
  • - Minimum Bachelor's Degree in Business Studies/Administration/Management.
  • - At least a year experience in relevant field.
  • - Good computer skills (MS-Word and Excel) is needed.
  • - Strong english proficiency on both oral and written is required.
  • - Excellent communication skills both verbal and written.
  • - Excellent interpersonal skills and a collaborative management style.
  • - Must possess 2 wheeler transportation with valid driving license.
  • To Apply,
  • Please send your applications with a detailed resume at nepal@fusemachines.com
